this is the standard tape for combination print
air bubbles disappear from between the tape and plate, and between the tape and sleeve or cylinder for virtually bubble-free mounting
the embossed crosshatched pattern imprints unique micro-channels into the easy mount adhesive that allows entrapped air to escape

the adhesive on the non-linered (sleeve/cylinder) side is designed for mounting to flexographic printing cylinders or sleeves, providing easy application at mounting and clean removal when demounting.on easy with reduced air entrapment3m air release liners have a crosshatched pattern, unlike other mounting tapes that use a pebbled or flat release liner
double coated tape has air release feature with high plate side adhesion

our 3m cushion-mount plus plate mounting tape e1020h with easy mount adhesive is designed for mounting flexographic print plates to cylinders or sleeves
tape also removes cleanly from the sleeve or steel print cylinder
setup is faster with smoother surfaces for cleaner print quality and higher productivity
the adhesive on the linered (plate) side of the tape is designed for mounting of photopolymer plates
grooves in the adhesive are created by a cross-hatch pattern from the release liner
print plates mounted on e1020h will have no air bubbles under the plate due to the air release feature designed into the tape
